name: Fleeting Memory, Mass
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: Black Markets © 2015, Paizo Inc.
target: one creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
text: This spell functions as fleeting memory, except that it affects multiple creatures.
target_zh: 一个生物/等级，任两者之间不得超过30呎
text_zh: 此法术如同转眼即逝 (Fleeting Memory)一般作用，不过它能影响复数生物。
